actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Practice&Procedure.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Practice and Procedure

official_title: A bill to reimburse the city of Frederick, Maryland, for money paid by the citizens of such city to save and hold harmless valuable military and hospital supplies owned by the United States Government.

summary.text: Provides for the reimbursement of the city of Frederick, Maryland, of money paid in 1864 by the citizens of such city to Confederate Lt. General Jubal A. Early to save and hold harmless certain military and hospital supplies owned by the United States.

titles.title: A bill to reimburse the city of Frederick, Maryland, for money paid by the citizens of such city to save and hold harmless valuable military and hospital supplies owned by the United States Government.
